archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.1.4c: c) account management, including the creation, amendment and deletion of user (or service) accounts; and the allocation, modification and removal of access control rights or privileges (including frequency of review)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
